author: Special Correspondent
text:
A 45-year-old woman, Sebastial of Thondamanthurai, was arrested for having allegedly murdered her husband Antonysamy (55) at their residence on Saturday.

Police said that Antonysamy used to pick quarrels with his wife after consuming alcohol. Irked over the continuing problem, Sebastial and her brother Danislal attacked Antonysamy with wooden logs and killed him. Arumbavur police arrested the woman and her brother.
title: Woman held for husband’s murder
